text: Hi guys, one quick helpâ€¦I have 2 blogs on my account, I just wanna move some posts from one to another, have same way to do it? Or I need to replicate all posts again?
edit the post you want to move.  go to the settings and if you click update url, you should be able to select the blog you want to associate it with
